macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: S&P 500 Rises 1.40% in Santa Claus Rally Kickoff
items.summary: The S&P 500 Index rose 1.40 percent last week, hitting new intraday and closing highs amid a Santa Claus rally, with the Nasdaq Composite up 1.22 percent and Dow Jones Industrial Average gaining 1.20 percent. Gains were driven by AI-related tech stocks and positive holiday momentum despite thin volumes.

items.title: US Q3 GDP Surges to 4.3% Annualized Rate
items.summary: The delayed Q3 gross domestic product report showed the US economy grew at a 4.3 percent annualized rate, beating expectations by over a percentage point and marking the strongest growth in two years. Stronger-than-expected data raised concerns about potential Fed interest rate adjustments in 2026.

items.title: 19 US Stocks Highlighted in Weekend Watchlist
items.summary: Weekend scans identified 19 stocks including CRM, SHOP, and TE for potential opportunities, with detailed analysis available to members. Themes and group discussions to be covered in upcoming video.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin falls ~32% amid large ETF outflows and market deleveraging
items.summary: Bitcoin plunged roughly 32% over recent sessions as major BTC ETFs saw net outflows of about $5.5 billion, with analysts noting ongoing retail accumulation and continued institutional interest from firms like BlackRock despite the sell-off.

items.title: Bitcoin price technical outlook: bearish short-term momentum toward $79k target
items.summary: Technical analysis suggests BTC is trading in a descending channel with short-term bearish indicators and potential downside targets near $79,405 unless price breaks above ~94,205, which would reopen a bullish path to ~$100,505.

items.title: Large token unlocks scheduled for multiple altcoins next week
items.summary: A number of altcoin token unlocks are planned in the coming days (including Treehouse, Kamino and others), which market commentators warn could increase sell pressure for affected tokens when they unlock.

items.title: Michael Saylor/Strategy releases Bitcoin tracker data, hinting at accumulation
items.summary: Strategy founder Michael Saylor published Bitcoin Tracker information again, which observers interpret as a possible signal of further BTC accumulation by the firm.

items.title: Coinbase Institutional outlines three areas that will dominate crypto in 2026
items.summary: Coinbase Institutional says structural shifts will reshape markets in 2026 and highlighted three priority areas expected to dominate the crypto landscape next year.

items.title: BNB rises above 860 USDT amid broader market moves
items.summary: Binance reports BNB crossed the 860 USDT mark with a ~1.87% gain in the latest 24-hour snapshot, reflecting mixed altcoin performance during the market downturn.

items.title: Analysis: Bitcoin network milestones and on‑chain stats ahead of year-end
items.summary: Commentary on Bitcoin block heights, hash rate and difficulty shows the network remains robust (hash rate ~1,150 EH/s and difficulty ~148T) as the chain approaches round-number milestones that could attract market attention.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Epic Games Store Offers SKALD: Against the Black Priory for Free
items.summary: SKALD: Against the Black Priory, a retro-style party-based RPG with grim-dark fantasy and Lovecraftian horror elements, is free to claim on Epic Games Store from December 28-29, 2025.

items.title: Nicktoons & The Dice of Destiny Receives Mixed PS5 Review
items.summary: The isometric action RPG featuring Nickelodeon characters like SpongeBob and TMNT in Diablo-style hack-and-slash gameplay is praised for nostalgia but criticized for lack of creativity and high $49.99 price.

items.title: Dropee Telegram Game Releases PvP Quiz Answer for December 28
items.summary: The daily quiz in the crypto-gaming Telegram app Dropee asked 'What does PvP stand for in gaming?' with the answer 'Player versus Player' for December 28, 2025 rewards.

items.title: Donot Blockchain Game Shares Daily Combo for December 28-29
items.summary: Donot, a play-to-earn blockchain game launched in December 2024, released its daily combo challenges for December 28-29, 2025, offering up to 1,000 DONOT tokens via tasks and events.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
